page.title: 18 A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: The day starts when I get up around 7.30. Breakfast is usually Rice Krispies, cheese on toast and a cup of tea.I then brush my hair,teeth,get washed and dressed in my school uniform.This uniform is a grey/navy skirt,white shirt and tie and a grey/navy cardigan.I walk to school with my schoolbag containing my homework.At school I get lessons in language,maths,history,geography, science,music,P.E, art/craft or work with our school computer.We have 3 breaks in our school day,2 playtimes and a lunch_break of 90 minutes.After school I watch television until teatime. After tea I might go out to play,go to a disco or go and visit my gran.My bed_time is at 10 o'clock.
